connect20/medma_removeallorders.name: connect20/Medma_RemoveallOrders

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/medma_removeallorders.description: The extension provides the functionality of removing the selected orders on a single button click. This extension is primarily targeted for Developers but it can be very handy and useful for Merchants, in certain circumstances.
